Key Match Events: Steve Mouine equalized in the 50th minute
Junior Olaitan converted a penalty in the 62nd minute
Post-Match Reflections: This victory helped Benin Republic recover from their 1-0 loss to Nigeria and move into second place in Group D
Libya, with a draw and a loss, now sit at the bottom of the group
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a crucial test for both teams in the AFCON 2025 Group D qualifier
